full_summary:
===============

### Tender Title

Decarbonizing Ground Support Equipment at Canadian Airports

### Solicitation Reference

PW-22-01017991 - Amendment 1

### Solicitation Number

5000069255

### Summary

The Government of Canada, as part of its commitment to a low-carbon economy, is seeking proposals for a project to decarbonize ground support equipment at Canadian airports. This project aims to support the government's goal of reducing greenhouse gas emissions and air pollutants in the aviation sector.

### Tender Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking a partner to develop knowledge of the ground support equipment used at Canadian airports, including its ownership, operation, and power sources. The project will also assess the current and projected renewal plans for this equipment up to 2035.

### Terms and Conditions

* Contract duration: 34 weeks from contract award
* Security requirements apply; refer to the Request for Proposal for details
* Integrity Provisions: Section 01 of the 2003 Standard Instructions applies
* Service Requirements: Bidders must provide required information as detailed in the RFP
* Trade Agreements: This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

### Additional Information

* Bidders may request a debriefing within 15 working days of receiving the results of the bidding process
* Environment and Climate Change Canada offers procurement services in both official languages
* Interested suppliers should contact Jim Séguin at Jim.Seguin@ec.gc.ca for additional information

### Attachments

* [PDF available on the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/d592526fe8a083ed72df03bdc904d97b/5000069255_eng_2022-12-19.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/d592526fe8a083ed72df03bdc904d97b/5000069255_eng_2022-12-19.pdf)
* [PDF available on the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/20/e4714dffca2c985fa9a5e15f511bc555/5000069255_fr_202
